ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between midnight and 5am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 61. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

space_weather:
Space Weather Message Code: ALTTP2
Serial Number: 1432
Issue Time: 2025 Oct 07 2051 UTC

ALERT: Type II Radio Emission
Begin Time: 2025 Oct 07 2007 UTC
Estimated Velocity: 755 km/s



Description: Type II emissions occur in association with eruptions on the sun and typically indicate a coronal mass ejection is associated with a flare event.

Serial Number: 2593
Issue Time: 2025 Oct 07 1347 UTC

ALERT: Geomagnetic K-index of 4

Synoptic Period: 1200-1500 UTC
 
Active Warning: Yes

www.swpc.noaa.gov/noaa-scales-explanation
